content: Here you'll find files and folders that other {{productName}} members shared with you. Your own files and room content are not shown here.

comment.text: This text explains the content of the "Shared with You" folder view. It clarifies that this section displays files and folders shared by other users of {{productName}}, and does not include the user's own files or room content. It appears within the EmptyContainer component, specifically when the "Shared with You" folder is empty.
